content.detailedDescription:
I felt drawn outside around 4 pm on 2/28/08 thursday. i was looking at a few jets spewing out chemtrails when i noticed a silvery football shaped orb (w/no exhaust nor features). it was a very clear, blue bird sky with the exception of the chemtrails. i yelled for my girlfriend to come outside and she spotted it also. we both agreed it looked more like an oval, football shape with a silvery luminosity that stood out in contrast compared to the chemtrails jets that were close to it. at one point in the beginning, i thought the object was going to crash into or nearly miss a chemtrail jets as they approached each other from opposite directions. i caught one good photo with my digital binoculars as it faded into the distance.
 by the way, i've come to relize that i've had contact all my life. my girlfriend has had quite a few sightings w/me and is now is convinced believer. she has had a dream (last feb-jan)where by a craft hovers over her  mothers' house as it drops geometric lights over the house and yard. similar to the levittown incidet. she said it was a very vivid dream. i have photographed other craft/light forms near my home. thanks for hearing me out, joe
content.summary: Daylight disc seen near home.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the house working. my son had a number of his football team friend over for a party. some were inside and he was with some outside playing basketball. i heard him yelling for me to get the camera there was something outside. i got the camera and ran outside.  it was then i saw the lights. there were 3 orange rectangular lights. they looked like they were attached to something, but i couldn't tell what the object looked like. the lights were vertical and had a space between them. the lights were high in the sky and i don't know how far away they were. the lights did not blink, they were steady. my son took the video of the lights until the vanished. it all lasted about 3 minutes. we also noticed that there were jets in the area.
content.summary: My son was outside with several of his friends when he started yelling and for me to get my digital camera. i got the camera and ran outside with it.  when i got outside i saw 3 rectangle lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving along i10 west towards katy where we live after having left a concert event downtown. i was driving and she was in the passenger seat sitting back and resting her eyes. at around 11:40 pm i noticed in the distance a light in the sky darting earthward in the area of bear creek park.  initially i thought it was a meteor as the elapsed time i saw it was no longer that about 10 seconds.  the object became invisible or should i say no light was emited anymore so i assumed it had flamed out and hit the ground somewhere in the area where i saw it fall. i would add that as it appeared to be large enough to make a definite impact i did slow down to see if from the freeway i could see any smoke or fire from an impact. as i drove by the area where i felt it had fallen i could see no signs of any type of impact. as i passed the bear creek park area moving west about 5 minutes later i noticed a bright light flying in the sky. i just kinda appeared out of nowhere.   like the object i had seen before i looked like a comet or meteor what was different however was that the object was moving upward towards the sky at a very fast rate so fast that with in about 15 seconds it just accelerated and disappeared.  to emphasize the upward  flight of the object was at first level with the ground then arched slightly upward vanishing as it accelerated. the light i saw from the object at both times was a whitish ball and tail with an orange glow emanating from the front part of the front.  i believe it may have been the same object i initially saw because it was coming from the area of the park where i had seen the initial object. once the object vanished the first words can remember saying was what the hell as i was shocked by what i had seen. my wife was not witness to what i saw as she was sleeping and to date i still havent told her what i saw.
content.summary: Ufo spotted along i10 west corridor near bear creek park.

content.detailedDescription:
Here���s my story: 
location: sulphur, la
date fall of 1997 or 1998
specific location: matt walker stadium (sulphur high school)
specific date: homecoming night
 
            i, along with my ex-wife and two friends from my same street were seated on the home team side of the stadium app. half way up facing east. during the halftime home coming events on the field i witnessed a 2 foot diameter orb traveling horizontally from north to south over the field. the object was not like the 2 dimensional translucent orbs seen in most pictures after development. this object was a solid 3d sphere, not a light. its color was a bluish green. it was traveling between 80 and 100 mph. the entire sighting lasted a little over 2 seconds. it traveled over the eastern hatch marks on the field and was slightly lower than the field lights. nearly ever person was focused on the homecoming court down on the field. upon seeing the orb i immediately notified my friends. two of the three were able to see the orb before it rapidly faded out of site. the object had very sharp defining edges no blurs or fuzziness, the inside seemed to be made of plasma, it was not extremely bright and flew in a perfectly strait and flat trajectory. the most interesting part of the story came later.
            the next day upon seeing my neighbor in his yard i related the events of the previous night. to my shock he had a story of his own. he told me on the night in question at app. 1:30am he and his wife was up late watching tv, when all of a sudden he had an urge to get up and walk outside. he claims he had not heard or seen anything to make him go out. as he proceeded outside his wife also followed suit. they were both drawn to look westward towards my house. an oak tree stood just south of the southwest corner of my house. upon first looking toward the southwest corner of my house they saw nothing, then a small solid orb about 1-1/2 to 2 feet in diameter came floating out from either my bedroom wall or behind the west wall of my house. the orb floated up into the oak tree maneuvering around the large branches. after a few seconds the orb floated clear of the tree then stopped perfectly still app. 35 feet off the ground as if to let them get a good look at it. then all at once it flew upward and away in a southwest direction at a very high rate of speed until it could no longer be seen. i asked the wife if she had got up to follow the husband outside, and she said no, she had been drawn by a mysterious urge of go outside also. these are professional college educated people. the only discrepancy between their two stories was the color of the orb. he said it was bluish, she said it was greenish. i saw it as blue green. the orb made no sound and left no visible trail. there is nothing openly known in the industrial or military complex that can fly with no open ports or wings that we currently know of. the orb is particularly similar to the orb recorded on nasa tv  sts mission 37. only the color is different.

below is a re_creation of what i witnessed.
 
similar links: 
http://jasonleigh.Org/van.Htm
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gdghxcgax98
content.summary: 2' bluegreen orb observed up close.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the back patio and at about 8:30pm i saw what initially looked to be "giant" orange spotlights in the sky, northwest of our home. three were two sets. one set had 9 horizontal lights and the other had a set of 3 orange lights. the distance between them was not very far and they were brightly lit for about 30 seconds. i called for my wife to come out and see the objects. there were about 20 to 30 separate objects moving in close proximity of the orange lights location. each of the  smaller objects were small, but very bright cone of iridescent green which was readily visible. the "green cones" moved up, down, and sideways. the green glow would become bigger and brighter. a few seconds after that, the big orange lights appeared fairly close to where i'd seen them earlier, but it was clear that the big object had moved, and the green cones were all around the orange lights.

the big orange lights came on horizontally, one after another until all 9 lights were brightly lit. the second object, with the 3 lights, came on about 20 seconds after the bigger (9) light show was complete, but this time the smaller orange one was a considerable distance away. the green cones split up and some were clearly with each orange object. the bigger orange object was closer to us now and i detected two things i hadn't noticed earlier. the diameter of the orange light was huge and it appeared to have  spoke like markings like an old wagon wheel.  the other thing i noticed was the glow of orange light on what looked to be metal. my wife and i were convinced that the larger object was a craft of some sort.

the entire episode lasted about 20 minutes. the orange lights were repeated about six times. then everything disappeared as abruptly as they had showed up. we waited another 30 minutes, but nothing else appeared.
content.summary: My wife were on our back patio when we saw an object with 9 orange lights and another  object with three orange lights and there were ot her objects, about 30 that were moving in the proximity of the orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and 3 children (two our own) were driving west on hwy 76 on oct. 31st at 4:00pm, near houston, mn. (se mn) when my wife, a ufo skeptic, seen two metallic disk shape craft flying at approx. 100mph to the north.  the craft were about 1000 feet in front of the vehicle, and at about 20 feet over the tree tops. a 13 year old in the back seat seen the crafts at about the same time my wife did. he asked my wife, what are those in the sky, and her response was, they must be ufo's that your dad talks about. at that time the other two children seen the crafts. at one point they slowed and hovered over the roadway. my wife said, the bottom part of the disks were silver and reflected sun light and the top part was black with port holes. my youngest stated that the bottom of the both crafts rotated, in a spinning motion. all that seen the crafts agreed that they were about 30 feet across and 8 to 10 feet tall.  as my wife approached, where the craft was hovering over the roadway, they began to move. the crafts then vanished out of sight. they did not fly out of sight, they just vanished. (no clouds in the sky) the craft did not make any sound, did not have nay lights and produced no visible trail. people in the van remained calm and interested, and not frightened in anyway.
content.summary: Silver disk shape.

content.detailedDescription: Driving from work towards home and obove the littel vilage there was that bright orange light, it was big and i drove towards it. i stopt the car in the vilage and looked at it for a minute or so, another person was tehre was well (unkown to me) i took my crappy handycam and shot one picture. but at this point it became already weaker, i stept into my car again and tried to follow it out of the village and stopped next to a field without light pollution but it was gone. the image does not shows the size and the brightness it had while seeing with the naked eye!!! sorry my english, it all happend just 30 min ago!
content.summary: Bright orange light.

content.detailedDescription: Mufon you cannot push this away i could put 2000 photos on from last nite alone why are you not telling the public the absloute truth.
content.summary: Ufos everyday...Where r u mufon

content.detailedDescription:
My family, my mother(alice greene), my two sisters(tanya hoffman & evelyn pearson) and my son jordan sechrist, were outside in the vacant lot next to my mothers' house. we had a pit fire going and were just having fun. someone, i don't remember who, said that there were some stars moving in the sky. we all looked up and saw a number, 7 or more what looked like stars, but more brighter, moving is different directions. they were moving back and forth, up and down and sideways. they were definitely, not airplanes. there was no noise. they didn't change size or color.

i was using my mother's cell/camera to take video of the objects. after about 5 minutes, 4-5 jets, we thought they might be military, came from the south and chased the ufo's to the north. then we saw the jets coming back from the north and the ufo's were chasing the them. then we didn't see them again.
content.summary: My family and i were outside next  to my mothers house and we saw a number of starlike objects moving in the sky - they were chased off my military jets.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching msnbc report. the reporter was in front of the capitol. behind a light flashing and moving strangely. i though it was a plane. at the moment i said to my self plane i thought about 9/11 and know that planes dont fly over washington dc. i will try to get the video from msnbc.
hope you do too!
content.summary: Bright light in the night sky wile watching msnbc. it was behind a reporter in washington dc!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my deck having a cigarette at about 12:10 am. i live by south coast plaza and i was facing south looking up at the moon and the constellation of orion. a plane had just gone by and was fading from sight at about 10,000 feet. 

then 3 star like lights flying much higher and faster came flying between orion and the moon. at first i thought it was a plane because i could hear them. but when i looked at the wing span, i said to myself, that is too huge to be a plane, it was a vast distance between the 3 lights forming a triangle. 

then just as i realized it couldn't possible be a plane, the 3 lights moved together laterally without touching but forming a very tight triangle, while still flying at an incredible speed. they continued in this manner for only 5 or 10 seconds then split apart again into the original formation. this gave me a slight feeling of nausea. it was incredible. 

at that point i ran to get my fiance to tell her to come look, but when she got out to the deck they were gone. they were heading due south, or slightly south west. john wayne airport is nearby our house. 

i got my camera and waited for about 20 minutes to see if any more would fly by. at 12:20 another normal plane flew by at about 10,000 feet, which reaffirmed the other objects were flying much higher and must have covered great distances in mere seconds in their maneuvers. 

i couldn't sleep all night, until about 6 am i nodded off and awoke at 8 am.
content.summary: 3 craft flying in triangle formation at fast speed executing impossible manuevers.

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling down the m180 on the 14,11,2008 at 11.30 when i notive on the horizon a cluster of what at first i thought was the 'plough' star formation'.
this at first i accepted but as i was travelling in a northerly direction for 10 miles the objects that made up this formation went from west to east. i pulled over and got out of my car, glancing up at them they were what seemed to be in formation in a sorte' type pattern. they were travelling at the same speed i would sy that a commercial jet would be on a gears down' approach to an airport, they were all the same shape but for a few smaller only slight and all the same colour. 
there was no sound, no strobe flashing, no smell,  at one point i counted 15 in line with more coming at the time that i was talking to my partner on my mobile phone explaining what i was witnessing. i was at the time very calm, not upset or confused at what i saw but in awe at the spectaculsr 'fly past'.
when they had past my vehicle i got back inside and looked up again to see the last one had dissapeared.
i started travelling on my journey north and could not see them any more.
content.summary: Solid orange sphere like object

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of window on sunday morning ag 6:30 am  saw a blue, silver object flying behind trees. it moved a treetop level ,stopped and then moved toward pleasantdale rd. i watched it for about 4 minutes. it was moving slow and then fast. i somehow knew it was there ,it always is in the same area. i never really expect it , i just know..It was the size of a baseball.
content.summary: Looked out window saw a blue-silver disc shaped object behind trees. it was revolving.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of window on sunday morning ag 6:30 am  saw a blue, silver object flying behind trees. it moved a treetop level ,stopped and then moved toward pleasantdale rd. i watched it for about 4 minutes. it was moving slow and then fast. i somehow knew it was there ,it always is in the same area. i never really expect it , i just know..It was the size of a baseball.
content.summary: Looked out window saw a blue-silver disc shaped object behind trees. it was revolving.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed bright glowing obect coming back from shopping at walmart,under binoculars i got a close-up view of a glowing object in the southern sky all colors of the rainbow witnessed by 3 other people and took pic on 35 mm camerea of object.Has been stationary star like but looked on web for planets and not in that direction and i never noticed it before.
content.summary: Under binoculars glowing object.

content.detailedDescription:
It was long time since a saw it, so something i could not remember exactly.
  one day in a summer, my neighbor called me aloud to watch some thing in the west while i enjoyed the cool on the roofs at sundown. it was just a like a another sun which was smooth red, big ball, shining with soft light. it was hanging on the middle of the hill which was about 3 miles away.
  i was sure it not phosphorescence， for it was big. and i was sure it was not the sun, because the sun has been fallen down for about 30 minutes. and i am sure it was not imagine, for it looks like a object. it was 3 miles way from my house, i could not see it exactly. 

   i could not remember how did i lost the sight of it. it was last for about 5 minutes and it was hanging there without moving.
content.summary: Object  looked like big ball with big diameter at sundown

content.detailedDescription: I was on my roof at night and saw a shape that flew past my point of view. facing se. at first i thought it was an airplane but then it occurred to me that is not the path the planes go on to land at jfk or lagaurdia airport. also, no sound! all this happened so quickly but it was moving much much faster than a plane could and much larger. i can understand how size perception can be distorted but i have a good reference on how big planes look and how fast since i am on my roof all the time and live in nyc. i see planes go by all the time. this was very different. i lost sight of the object because other buildings blocked the view for me. all in all it (seemed) about 2 maybe 3 seconds long.
content.summary: Saw it twice a 1/2 second gap where it was invisible. it was a clear night.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 11pm we were driving down verona rd between battle creek and marshall and as we approached the intersection of verona rd and 13 mile rd i saw on the left side of the road a object with a very bright spot light type light hovering just over the trees the object was shining this spot light on the ground and the trees and ground were lit up as if it was daytime and as we got closer to this thing it instantly went from just above the trees to being way up in the sky so i told my mom to stop the car and she did we all got out of the car and watched the object it then started to move towards us and it flew right over us it did not make any noise and it looked triangle shape with 3 white lights one in the front and two in the back with a red light in the center and none of the lights were blinking it slowly drifted to east northeast.

it was the strangest thing i have ever scene.

i have included a quick sketch
content.summary: Ufo hovering over trees shining very bright spot light on ground

content.detailedDescription:
On or about september 11, 2008 as i was taking my usual evening bike (around 9:15 pm) i observed a low flying craft that i was unable to identify.

the first thing that drew my attention to the craft was the hum of its engine. it was a kind of hum-flutter sound. i have military, law enforcement, and some flight training, so i was more interested in trying to figure out what kind of craft it was when i first looked up and saw almost directly over me.. 

the aircraft was more or less in a kind of very slow moving hover mode.

the trees where i ride my bike are maybe 50 to 70 feet tall,
the craft was maybe another 100 feet or so above the trees. i���m not too good at estimating distances, but to me it was like looking at school buss maybe two blocks or so away. 

the sky was very clear that night, and filled with visible stars, so the craft was very easy to see. i was directly under it traveling very slowly north on my bike, and the craft was traveling very slowly south  (barely moving). 

the craft was triangular in shape, and had alternating red and white flashing lights all around it. they were evenly spaced about a foot or so apart on all three sides. the nose of the craft had a dished out area that contained a high beam light. i could see the beam reached out into the sky until it faded out. the light seemed to have the ability to turn as if it was searching the sky.

the body of the craft was for the most part just a dark colored area surrounded by the flashing lights. i really couldn���t make out any specific details. while i looked up at the craft i first thought it must be some kind of new helicopter (because it was so low and so slow moving, and almost familiar flutter sound of the engine), but it was not shaped like any helicopter i had ever seen before, or like any other aircraft i had ever seen before.

i took my eyes off of the craft for maybe a second or two to turn my bike around from going north to going south, and that fast the craft was gone. it was a completely clear night, i could see the stars in all directions, and there was not a single aircraft in the sky. at that moment i was convinced that what i had seen was no ordinary aircraft. again, it was like looking at a school bus sitting in an open field maybe 200 feet away, then while blinking your eyes it is completely gone.

i rode my bike around for a while to see if i could spot it again, but no luck. when i got home i called the local police department to inquire if anyone had called in to report seeing anything unusual in the sky. they said no, and asked why. i told them what i had seen and the lady i talked to sounded interested, but i���m sure she probably thought i was a nut���i felt like one just telling her the story.

i also tried to call the local airport control tower, but got a recording that they closed at 9 pm.

the next morning i called the airport control tower again, and was put in contact with the lady who was on duty that night. i told her my story, and asked if she knew of any aircraft that might come close to that description that would fly in our general area? she advised me that there were a few craft in the sky before 9 pm, but nothing at all after 9 pm, and nothing at all at any time traveling north to south. she seemed interested, so we chatted about it for a few minutes. she mentioned that the nearby air base had a lot of traffic going in and out of it, but i���m not sure what ���nearby��� air force base she is talking about?

on the evening of the event i typed everything about the incident into my computer, plus date and time. i subsequently deleted the story, and was sorry that i did a few weeks later. now i am not absolutely sure of the exact day or date.
content.summary: Triangular craft with nose lgiht and flashing red and white lights on all three sides.

content.detailedDescription:
First i'd like to say that the only reason i'm reporting this is because i just saw the ufos over earth fayettevile incident episode and noticed that there were some similarities. my sighting took place the day after the episode aired and i did not know about the show until after my sighting, when i googled the terms "fayetteville, nc" ufo. i googled that to see if anyone else had posted on the internet about seeing what i saw that night. i wasn't as much interested in older sightings as i was interested in finding someone else who saw the same thing that night. after googling that, i saw a description of the show, learned that it aired the night before, and sought it out on the internet so i could watch it. 

my story is extremely uneventful, but i figured i'd report it anyway as it could help to see the similarities in other cases from this area. myself and my boyfriend were traveling down bragg blvd, coming from downtown fayetteville, headed towards the sycamore dairy rd. intersection. i observed 3 large orange lights in the sky. higher than street lights, but low enough to catch my eye and seem strange. the road we were traveling on is quite a busy road so i kept looking around to see if anyone else was looking at the lights, it did not appear so. 

the 3 lights were orange in color and looked almost identical to the street lights that line bragg blvd, and most of fayetteville. they were about the same size. my boyfriend and i first thought it was 3 airplanes in formation, headed towards us, with very large headlights or something. we couldn't stop staring at them, waiting to see if they are airplanes or if they zoomed away in true ufo fashion. these 3 lights were in a diagonal line, the highest light being toward the right, and the lowest light at the left. they were appx. a half inch apart from our line of vision. all of a sudden, the bottom left light disappeared in the blink of an eye and reappeared on top of the formation in the right. it happened so quickly, that we at first thought a 4th light appeared. but really, only 3 were visible. that happened again, in the blink of an eye the lights rearranged with a new one seemingly appearing at the top of the formation, but still only 3 were visible. 

we could not see the lights moving. just popping up suddenly in a new spot, but the entire time they remained in the diagonal line and only 3. i am not sure how long this whole event happened. it seems like about 3 minutes, but it may have been shorter. i have seen planes dropping flares before and it was similar to that, except the lights stayed stationary and illuminated much longer than the flares i've seen. 

we continued staring at them while traveling up bragg blvd when the light on the top right just blinked out. it was gone and only 2 lights remained. i'd like to add that nowhere near these 3 lights were any blinking lights like those on common aircraft. just these 3, large, orange orbs. they did not move, they were not traveling, they seemed to be hovering. then, about 30 seconds after the first light disappeared, the 2nd light disappeared. at this moment i decided to take my cellphone out and try to get a photo. only 1 light remained at this point and i knew my cellphone wasn't good at taking quality photos but i tried anyway. that is how i know the exact time of this sighting, because of the time stamp on my photo. i took the photo and the light is visible, although it is whiter and smaller in the photo. i was still looking through my cellphone about to take another photo, waiting for the camera to get ready, when i saw the final light blink out. it happened the same instance i snapped the second photo and in the second photo there are no lights. the time stamp on the 2nd photo is 3-5 seconds after the first and the light is gone. 

we continued on our way and were heading towards where the lights were but did not see or hear anything else in the sky that night. it was slightly unsettling but mostly very strange. we do not know if this was some type of aircraft from fort bragg, but we both agree that this was not like any aircraft we've ever seen before. i will include the photo of the 1 orb that i got just before it disappeared. like i said before, it is quite unimpressive, but it is all that i have from the incident. there are lots of other lights in the photo, as it is night time and we are on a busy road. so i put a white arrow pointing at the light that is unexplainable.  i know it isn't a good photo, but at least it can give an idea of how low/high this was in the sky. thanks for your time.
content.summary: 3 orange balls in diagonal formation seemingly stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the army at ft. rucker, al and several friends and i had travelled to panama city beach for a weekend away from post.  saturday night my roommate gail rodriguez and i decided to take two of our friends out to a little bar at the south end of the strand which i believe is thomas dr.  my roommate and i wanted to come back to town to enjoy a carnival that was in town, so when we got to the bar, we dropped our girfriends off and agreed we would see them later in the evening.

as we were driving north again on thomas dr. the first thing i noticed is that the bumper to bumper traffic that was normal for a friday or saturday night along thomas drive was non-existant. we seemed to be the only ones on the road.  no cars passed us and none was behind or in front of us.

being an aviation buff, an air traffic control student at ft. rucker and an air force "brat" i had a habit of watching the sky for anything that moved.  i loved locating satelites.  but i saw something in the sky that night that i found odd.  there was a star, just a pin point in the sky that looked odd.  it was bright orange.  i had never seen a star that bright or that color before and thought it was odd.  gail and i continued our conversation and drive - but i kept glancing at the odd colored star i had seen and each time i looked at it - it appeared to be larger.  

i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, but kept watching, soon it was almost as big around as the moon.  so i finally said to gail, "have you been watching that star?"  she asked if i was referring tot eh orange one.  i told her yes, but "that's not star"!  and we decided to pull to the side of the road and watch it.  

still not another car passed us on the road.  

we don't know how long we watched, but as we huddled together in the front seat of the car(with the doors locked) the thing got bigger and bigger until it seemed to engulf the sky from horizon to horizon.  it was the biggest thing i's ever seen.  we couldn't tell how close it might be, but it appeared to settle halfway into the gulf of mexico so it looked like a huge cake plate cover.  we didn't know if it was far enough away that it was hovering over the gulf and what we were seeing was the curvature of the earth - or if it had actually setteled into the gulf.  we don't know for sure how long we watched it, but when it was ready to leave, it lifted up from the survace of the gulf and rose into the sky at a very fast rate of speed.  no sound, no water dripping off of it, no contrail - just this enormous bright orange ball lifting quickly into the night sky.  from the time it started lifting, to the time we could no longer see it might have been 30 - 45 seconds.  

still not another car had passed us the entire time we were pulled to the side of the road.  

shaking, we pulled back onto the road and continued our travel to panama city.  neither one of us spoke a word.  we dind't know what we had seen, but whatever it was, was not of this earth.  we elected not to go to the carnival, but instead chose to go back to the apartment we had rented and turn on the news to see if anyone had reported anything.  there was nothing on the news.  

later that night we asked our friends if they had heard of anyone seeing anything weird in the sky that night.  none had.  we continued listening to news broadcasts to find out if anyone had reported anything?  nothing.

we considered reporting it - but thought if no one believed us they might think we were emotionally unstable and get kicked out of air traffic control school at ft. rucker. so we kept it to ourselves.   

we talked about it often over the years until sometime in the 80's when i lost touch with gail.  bur if anyone can find her - i'm betting she'll tell you the same story.
content.summary: Round, bright blourescent orange - bigger than anything i'd ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:

hear too much, we'll cut you're ears fingers and tongue out.

know too much...
know too much....
pending........

age/family/history/skills?
content.summary: We are watching you

content.detailedDescription:
On october 23, 2008 at around 8:30pm, my friend hannah fair and i were driving out of stephenville, tx towards proctor, tx on hwy 377.When we were almost to the red light to turn onto hwy 377 towards proctor hannah told me to look at the shy because there was something she was seeing that could not be explained. i turned and looked out the passenger  side window and saw an unidentified lighted "object" in the sky. the lighted "object" can be described as follows: a row of moving lights traveling horizontal in a straight line that appeared to curve or trail off to the right as it would fade. the row of lights was in a set of three a space and three mor lights. the lights were yellowish in color and larger than the stars out as well as larger than the planes and other miscellaneous aircraft in the shy that could be seen. the "object" appeared to be closer to the ground because of the difference in six of the lights in comparison. also the lights were very bright.  hannah grabbed her digital camera from her purse and handed it to me. the "object" appeared 4 separate times in 4 separate locations. it would be lit up from 5-10 seconds, then disappear and reappear in a different area of the sky. i made a recording on her digital camera of the object upon the second appearance of the unexplainable lights. the lights appeared tw0 more times but i was unable to capture it on camera again due to the fact that i did not know how to work her camera very well and it would disappear by the time i coud get the camera ready. the time between the appearances varied but were around 30 seconds between each one. the fourth and final time there was a space of a couple of minutes. this time the object was in motion moving downward very rapidly. the lights were vertical this time and it did not stay lit up for more than 5 seconds. the sky was completely clear that night as far as weather. when we arrived in proctor, tx, i entered handy's and one of the ladies that worked there asked me if i saw any lights in a joking manner. i was shocked because although i had seen it with my own eyes it was strange/exciting to discover we were not the only ones who saw them. i told the customers and employees around about what i had seen.

end of statement
content.summary: my friend and i were driving  south from stephenville on hwy 377 to proctor, tx.  i looked out the passenger side window and saw an object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were coming from the first ever "freaknic" in ohio. it was late at night around 12:50-1:00 am. we were traveling northbound on superior road. when we arrived at the intersection of superior and mayfield road, i immediately noticed the brightest lights i had ever seen. i was a passenger and my brother was the driver. we were  stopped at the the light and i told my brother "what is that"!!! he looked at me and i seen the look of terror mixed with uncertainty in his eyes.As we crossed the intersection,there is a heavilywooded area know as ski hill. it sits behind a steep ravine and a basketball court which is at the top of the ravine. still northbound on superior, i told my brother to stop the vehicle. i got out and ran toward the basketball court. as i got closer to trees, i could see plain as day, something hovering behind the trees, and it was coming down into the ravine. i looked back at my brother and he stood outside his car door on total shock. i was so animated, like wtf!! i noticed the lights were not the type of lights that are on any type of helicopter or plane that i had ever seen. i made sure that i got a real (good) look at it too. there were like red circle lights that fluctuated to a bright white and back to red. it never touched the ground. it must have noticed that i seen it, because it started slowly hovering back up, coming out of the ravine. i am keeping my eyes on it as it slowly hovered around the treeline next to the basketball court. i ran toward the street(superior) and  steadily trying to get all the passing cars attention to look at the hovering lights!!! i then got back into the car and told my brother to follow the craft. we made a left on belmar street, another left on rosedale, and another left on to eddington which leads back to superior road. we still see the object and the lights are flickering even faster-still counter-clockwise. it is at least 80 yards above the treeline-making our way back to the intersection of mayfield and the next intersection of mayfield and monticello we still see the object..Then with lightening fast speed it zig-zagged motion and darted east and was gone...We were in awe..And i still get the chills when i talk about it. i finally wanted to come forward because i didnt want to seem crazy. i recently saw on ufo hunters the same object that i seen, was also seen in trumbull county..In 1994!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: The object that was seen looked like an egg- shaped, or looked like the side of a football-with bright luminous lights-the kind they use in a stadium. it flickered from red to white and the lights were circling counter-clock wise as the object hovered

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, a friend and i witness an un usual event in the skies over st.Neots cambridgeshire, at exactly 8.30pm tonight 16th november 2008.
 
when we came out of our front door (8.30pm) we notices three bright lights heading directly over us at a guess the first one was about half a mile ahead of the second object the third abject was around quarter of a mile.
 
what we saw was as follows each light had around it 5 or 6 other light in a circle closely gathered looking like one object all 3 objects looked the same. the lights were flickering yellow/orange (mostly orange). while we were watching these object the 3rd object released a rally of lights off in the direction of the second object, this lasted only about 8/10 seconds, the second objects lights dimmed and changed direction it seemed to slow up stop for a split second and then fall at an increase speed back from the direction it was first coming and then fall from the sky. as it fell it lights faded and no longer could be seen.
the first light continued until it went out of sight followed by the third object.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 objects flying in line rear object released sparkly fire and second fell from sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a flight instructor and i was with a student on a navigation training flight. we were about 5 miles south of the chesapeake bay bridge heading sw towards bowie at around 10 am. the weather was clear and chilly with very little wind. this was the last leg of the trip and we had descended to 2500 feet and my student was doing well so there was very little for me to do except to help watch for traffic. i noticed traffic, approximately over baltimore, at around 7,000 feet. i'm guessing the angle of elevation was around 60 degrees. it's hard to say for sure what its altitude was because i couldn't make out any shape to tell what it was to help judge distance. it was just a small gray blob; about 1/8 inch at arms length. i pointed it out to my student and he acknowledged it. it was no factor to us and he paid no further attention to it. but i was curious because it didn't seem to be moving and so i kept track of it. on occasion there was a glint of sunlight reflecting from it. i was puzzled because helicopters don't often fly that high and if they do they don't hover. i gawked at it and wondered what they were doing. occasionally it would move a small amount very abruptly, or go up or down just slightly. i didn't think this apparent small amount of motion was due to any atmospheric condition, so it just made me more curious. about 5 minutes into this observation, as i was watching it and wondering what those guys were doing, it shot straight up so fast that i couldn't really track it with my eyes. it was out of sight very quickly. it didn't accelerate, it was just instantly going very fast and i know helicopters can't do that. i don't know of anything that can. this object made no smoke, left no kind of vapor trail, and i looked for a contrail above where it was and never saw one. i am certain that this object was not "flying", as in any kind of aerodynamic process, so the term ufo isn't accurate. i don't recall the name of the student that was with me and i don't know if anyone else witnessed this thing or not.
content.summary: Observed object hovering for about 5 min, then it shot straight up very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I haven't any real idea what it was exactly i saw all i know is i saw something completely bizar in broad daylight in the east torwards pikes peak mountain.

the "objects were shiny in nature at first looked connected with each other i thought possibly at the time it was a flock of birds trailing each other like following the leader.  but with zero clouds in the sky as they were turn in a slow motion manner would disapear from sight then return to my sight slowly as these objects moved in the sky.  the best way i can describe these tiny or at least what appearerd as tiny silvery objects like awave of water in the ocean moves in random directions while a jellyfish swishes around the tide in a ever slow motion manner.

these tiny silver and shiny lookin objects would change directions as if it were follow the leader except i could figure out how these little objects were disappearing from my view and back all this happened in broad daylight and no ther werent any other spectators other then myself bizar i tell ya!

didnt have any cameras on me and no other witnesses i even hate writing this    tiny little bit of info to you guys i knowing for damn sure noone is gonna believe such none sense but i know what i saw wasnt an illusion i simply cant explain any of it.

some might ask was a ufo by webster's dictionary as defines yes it was plural many objects i could possibly identify but you ask me was it an et type ufo and i will respond to "i have no friggin clue" i wasnt able to ask this thing anything cause of how far up in the sky it was lol!

at anyrate if you know what this is by all means please explain it because i cant.
content.summary: Very odd and not sure at what it was i was watching for ten minutes

content.detailedDescription: On november 11, 2008 about 9:30 pm went to remove some items from car and saw this object streaking across sky, grapped camera from glove box and clicked as fast i could for it was crossing sky so fast. it was moving east to west direction. as the object went across sky there was absolutely no sound what so ever. only got five pictures but you can clearly see this object going east to west but it was extremely fast, i heard after the object was out of sight about three to four minutes, the sound of couple helicopters approach from easterly direction headed westward. could not make out what kind they were other than they were large and black looking.
content.summary: Another craft like stephenville, texas.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10pm when i was at my puter reading the mufon case files on (11/15/08) and noticed two reported sightings the evening before in my area. so i went outside where there was a very bright moon which made the stars seem dim. there were scattered clouds and the air was clear. i looked around and said to myself naw, go inside its cold. i then noticed what i thought was a plane because of the different colored lights i noticed. it was far off in the distance over the oregon city, beaver creek area. from my view it was 15 to 20 degrees above the horizion. i came inside and retrieved my binoculars. to me it looked like a large star which was paulsating a very bright,clear red,white,blue light. i came back inside and called a friend of mine.I'm reporting this because someone has reported the same basic thing the following evening about 20 miles away in vancouver washington.
content.summary: Stationary, paulsating star like object.
